
{{Client function}}
{{New feature/item|3.0151|1.5.1||
This function returns a specific [[/Element/Browser.md|browser]]'s volume.
}}

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
float getBrowserVolume ( browser webBrowser )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/Element/Browser.md|browser]]:getVolume||setBrowserVolume}}

===Required Arguments===
*'''webBrowser:''' A browser element

===Returns===
Returns a specific [[/Element/Browser.md|browser]]'s volume, or ''false'' if the browser element passed to the function is invalid.
